alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 4:53PM CDT until April 20 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL KERR AND CENTRAL GILLESPIE COUNTIES... At 452 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kerrville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. Quarter size hail was reported south of Kerrville at 449 PM CDT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kerrville, Fredericksburg, Center Point, Tivydale and Kerrville-Schreiner Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
